title: Amazing Deal Alert WOW Air Iceland & London $250 Roundtrip The Points Guy

type_specific.selection: Iceland’s low-cost carrier WOW Air is launching service from to Reykjavik from Boston (BOS) and Baltimore (BWI), beginning in March and June of 2015, respectively. And WOW are they doing it in style, offering great deals on flights from both destinations not only to Iceland, but also to other European destinations like London and Copenhagen.
